009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFit3Points;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitHyperSimple;
016
017/**
018 * RANSAC detector for circles.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 * 
022 * @see GeometricCircle
023 * @see RansacCurveDetector
024 */
025public class RansacDetectorCircle extends RansacCurveDetector<GeometricCircle>{
026        
027        /**
028         * Nested class extending {@link RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters} 
029         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
030         */
031        public static class Parameters extends RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters {
032                
033                /**
034                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
035                 */
036                public Parameters() {
037                        this.maxIterations = 1000;
038                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
039                        this.minInlierCount = 70;
040                }
041        }
042        
043        // constructors ------------------------------------
044
045        /**
046         * Constructor using specific parameters.
047         * @param params RANSAC parameters
048         */
049        public RansacDetectorCircle(Parameters params) {
050                super(3, params);
051        }
052        
053        /**
054         * Constructor using default parameters.
055         */
056        public RansacDetectorCircle() {
057                this(new Parameters());
058        }
059        
060        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
061
062        @Override
063        protected GeometricCircle fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
064                CircleFitAlgebraic fit = new CircleFit3Points(points);
065                return fit.getGeometricCircle();
066        }
067        
068        @Override
069        protected GeometricCircle fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
070//              CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitPratt(inliers);  // TODO: fails, check why
071                CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitHyperSimple(inliers);
072                if (fit2.getParameters() == null) 
073                        throw new RuntimeException("circle fitFinal() failed!");
074                return fit2.getGeometricCircle();
075        }
076}
